testcase.name: Free CRM create a deal scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is already on login page.........................................passed When title for login page is Free CRM.......................................passed Then user enters username and password......................................passed Then user click on login button.............................................passed Then user is on home page...................................................passed Then user move to new deal page.............................................passed Then user enters deal details title and amount..............................passed Then Close the browser......................................................passed
